data.title: Pretty Girls Make Graves Lyrics
meta_keywords: Listen to Pretty Girls Make Graves Song Online
Pretty Girls Make Graves Song MP3 by Audrey Horne
Download Pretty Girls Make Graves Song from Le Fol
data.meta_description: Pretty Girls Make Graves Lyrics by Audrey Horne. Now, listen to all your favourite songs, along with the lyrics, only on JioSaavn.
data.text:
I am reluctant to pronounce your name, Stuck here in these waters I still fight your wave I have been buried by your selfish game, I won′t forget the way you pinned me down With or without you I am still right here, Under your wave Without you I am nothing, I'm all pouring rain I set my mind at ease A pretty girl will always leave a grave, So now tell me what′s a boy supposed to do With or without you I am still right here, Under your wave Without you I am nothing, I'm all pouring rain I set my mind at ease When all is said and all is done, You cant go back again And every time you try to leave, You end up here again With or without you I am still right here, Under your wave Without you I am nothing, I'm all pouring rain I set my mind at ease With or without you I am still right here, Under your wave Without you I am nothing, I′m all pouring rain I set my mind at ease. Writer(s): Arve Isdal, Thomas Tofthagen, Torkjell Rod, Kjetil Greve
Lyrics powered by www.musixmatch.com
